name: chroma-js-client
description: Monorepo for the Chroma JS client and embedding providers

scripts.build: pnpm --filter "ai-embeddings-common" build && pnpm --filter "default-embed" build && pnpm --filter "chromadb" build && pnpm -r --filter "./packages/**" --filter "!ai-embeddings-common" --filter "!default-embed" --filter "!chromadb" --filter "!all" build && pnpm --filter "all" build
